summary.span: 提供 的基底實作。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是包含一個空的視窗元件編輯器頁面的完整實作。The class is a complete implementation for a component editor page that consists of an empty window. 您可以擴充此頁面以新增您自己的控制項。You can extend this page to add your own controls. 正由的。 is used by a of a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的範例實作。The following code example demonstrates an example implementation. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void EnterLoadingMode() cil managed

summary.span: 遞增載入計數器。

span.span: Increments the loading counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該先呼叫每個程序，以載入或初始化方法，以表示，它將會載入的項目才能編輯器 中顯示的載入的編輯器頁面。Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page. 當載入程序，呼叫完成時，它應該呼叫方法，指出已完成載入程序的一部分。When a loading procedure that called completes, it should call the method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed. 屬性會當做計數器以判斷當完成載入時使用。The property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete. 頁面是在載入模式，如果值屬性為非零。A page is in loading mode if the value of the property is non-zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void ExitLoadingMode() cil managed

summary.span: 遞減載入計數器。

span.span: Decrements the loading counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該先呼叫每個程序，以載入或初始化方法，以表示，它將會載入的項目才能編輯器 中顯示的載入的編輯器頁面。Each procedure that performs loading or initialization should first call the method to indicate that it will load something before the editor can display the loaded editor page. 當載入程序，呼叫完成時，它應該呼叫方法，指出已完成載入程序的一部分。When a loading procedure that called completes, it should call the method to indicate that its part of the load process is completed. 屬性會當做計數器以判斷當完成載入時使用。The property is used as a counter to determine when loading is complete. 頁面是在載入模式，如果值屬性為非零。A page is in loading mode if the value of the property is non-zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool IsPageMessage (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message msg);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsPageMessage(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& msg) cil managed
Public Overridable Function IsPageMessage (ByRef msg As Message) As Boolean

span.span: The message to process.

summary.span: 處理可由頁面處理的訊息。

span.span: Processes messages that could be handled by the page.

returns.span: 如果由頁面處理訊息則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the page processed the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓網頁來處理訊息之前呼叫端會使用它們。This method gives the page a chance to process messages before the caller uses them. 如果傳回`true`訊息將會是已使用，否則，呼叫端會繼續處理訊息。If this returns `true`, the message will be consumed; otherwise, the caller will continue to process the message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadComponent() cil managed

summary.span: 將元件載入網頁使用者介面 (UI)。

span.span: Loads the component into the page user interface (UI).

para.span: 每一頁必須覆寫這個方法，並實作其自己的自訂行為。

span.span: Each page must override this method and implement its own custom behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int Loading { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 表示要保留多少載入相依性，直到載入完成為止。

span.span: Indicates how many load dependencies remain until loading has been completed.

value.span: 剩餘的載入相依性數目。

span.span: The number of remaining load dependencies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用於追蹤剩餘的載入階段的數目。This property is used to track the number of loading stages remaining. 每個處理序需要完全載入文件，此計數器會累加載入開始，再遞減時處理每個載入完成。For each process needed to completely load the document, this counter is incremented before loading begins, and decremented when each loading process completes.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool LoadRequired { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

span.span: if a component must be loaded before editing can occur; otherwise, .

summary.span: 重新載入頁面的元件。

span.span: Reloads the component for the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法時，會呼叫目前元件可能已變更其他位置，而且需要重新載入使用者介面 (UI)。This method is called when the current component may have changed elsewhere and needs to be reloaded into the user interface (UI).

summary.span: 如果頁面支援說明資訊，則顯示說明資訊。

span.span: Shows Help information if the page supports Help information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這只會呼叫如果傳回`true`。This is only called if returns `true`. 說明系統呼叫方法以提供說明頁面。The Help system calls the method to provide Help for the page. 通常會以回應 F1 或按一下 [說明] 按鈕允許頁面以顯示其相關聯的說明主題時呼叫。 is usually called in response to F1 or when the Help button is clicked to allow the page to bring up its associated Help topic.
